title: Will the rate of CPI inflation be above 3.7% for the year ending in August 2023?
subtitle: 3.8% or higher
rules_primary: If the Consumer Price Index (CPI) increases by more than 3.7% in the twelve months ending August 2023 (as represented by the one-decimal place value reported by the Bureau of Labor Statistics), then the market resolves to Yes.
rules_secondary: The market will close at 8:25 AM ET on the date of the expected release of the data.
